page.title: 09GOVERNMENT IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: Hockwold{Parish Council}consists of 9 members,elected every 4 yrs.by those on the electoral roll.The Council meets once a month and discusses matters that parishioners have reported to them.They are consulted over all{Planning Applications}which have been submitted to the Borough Council,and are also Trustees of the { {Village Centre,}overseeing the running of the hall by the Management Committee.It is up to the Parish Council to inform the Electricity Board regarding street light malfunctions and the Highways Dept. regarding the state of roads and paths in the village.They are also in touch with the{Police}regarding law and order in the village.
